headline.main: BERLIN RAIL LINK DESTROYED BY RAF; Bombings Knocked Out Traffic Viaduct -- Foreign Office Reported Moved Away

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, Wednesday, Dec. 1 -- An account of the Berlin damage from last week's Royal Air Force bombings, given here today by an expert observer, revealed that the railway viaduct across the Unter den Linden extension near the zoo, which the RAF had vainly tried to hit many times before, was now down.
abstract: ry viaduct across Unter den Linden destroyed
